--- title: "Symbol Query Tool" layout: default ---
DynamoRIO API
Symbol Query Tool

symquery is a symbol querying tool that operates on Linux, Mac, and Windows and supports the Windows PDB, Linux ELF, Mac Mach-O, and Windows PECOFF formats with DWARF2 line information. It is part of the Dr. Memory tool suite. It is also included with DynamoRIO versions 5.0.0 and higher. If this documentation is part of a DynamoRIO public release, this link should point at the local documentation provided with the release package.
